languages.text: Неподалеку от остова корабля замечено поселение. Архитектура и устройство соответствуют стандартным шаблонам основания колониальных оснований, принятых в культе святого Друза. Присутствие живых организмов не зафиксировано. Судя по состоянию конструкций, поселение заброшено на протяжении минимум сотни лет.

A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.
languages.original_text: Неподалеку от остова корабля замечено поселение. Архитектура и устройство соответствуют стандартным шаблонам основания колониальных оснований, принятых в культе святого Друза. Присутствие живых организмов не зафиксировано. Судя по состоянию конструкций, поселение заброшено на протяжении минимум сотни лет.

The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

languages.text: Se ha avistado un asentamiento en las inmediaciones de la nave varada. Su arquitectura y diseño funcional coinciden con las plantillas estándar para fundación de colonias del Culto de San Drusus. No se detectan señales de vida. A juzgar por el estado de las estructuras, el asentamiento lleva abandonado al menos un siglo.
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

traits.locale_text: Se ha avistado un asentamiento en las inmediaciones de la nave varada. Su arquitectura y diseño funcional coinciden con las plantillas estándar para fundación de colonias del Culto de San Drusus. No se detectan señales de vida. A juzgar por el estado de las estructuras, el asentamiento lleva abandonado al menos un siglo.

languages.text: 你在这艘废弃舰船附近看到了一处定居点，它的建筑设计与功能设计，均与圣德鲁苏斯教派用来建立殖民地的标准模板一致。你没有发现任何生命迹象存在。从建筑的状况来判断，这处定居点已经被遗弃了至少一百年。
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

traits.locale_text: 你在这艘废弃舰船附近看到了一处定居点，它的建筑设计与功能设计，均与圣德鲁苏斯教派用来建立殖民地的标准模板一致。你没有发现任何生命迹象存在。从建筑的状况来判断，这处定居点已经被遗弃了至少一百年。

languages.text: 無人船の近くで集落を発見した。そのデザインは建築面でも機能面でも、聖ドルスス教団が使う植民地開拓用の通常の型と一致している。生命体は探知できない。建物の状態から見て、集落に少なくとも100年は人の手が入っていないことを物語っている。
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

traits.locale_text: 無人船の近くで集落を発見した。そのデザインは建築面でも機能面でも、聖ドルスス教団が使う植民地開拓用の通常の型と一致している。生命体は探知できない。建物の状態から見て、集落に少なくとも100年は人の手が入っていないことを物語っている。

languages.text: In der Nähe des verlassenen Schiffs wurde eine Ansiedlung entdeckt. Architektur und funktionales Design passen zu den Standardvorgaben des Kults des Hl. Drusus zur Koloniegründung. Es wurden keine Lebensformen registriert. Der Zustand der Gebäude lässt darauf schließen, dass die Ansiedlung seit mindestens hundert Jahren verlassen ist.
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

traits.locale_text: In der Nähe des verlassenen Schiffs wurde eine Ansiedlung entdeckt. Architektur und funktionales Design passen zu den Standardvorgaben des Kults des Hl. Drusus zur Koloniegründung. Es wurden keine Lebensformen registriert. Der Zustand der Gebäude lässt darauf schließen, dass die Ansiedlung seit mindestens hundert Jahren verlassen ist.

languages.text: Les augures ont également repéré une colonie à proximité du vaisseau. Son architecture et sa configuration fonctionnelle sont conformes aux modèles standards utilisés par le Culte de Saint Drusus lors de ses missions de colonisation. Aucune forme de vie n'est détectée. L'état des bâtiments indique que la colonie est abandonnée depuis au moins un siècle.
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.

traits.locale_text: Les augures ont également repéré une colonie à proximité du vaisseau. Son architecture et sa configuration fonctionnelle sont conformes aux modèles standards utilisés par le Culte de Saint Drusus lors de ses missions de colonisation. Aucune forme de vie n'est détectée. L'état des bâtiments indique que la colonie est abandonnée depuis au moins un siècle.

languages.text: Terk edilmiş geminin çevresinde bir yerleşim yeri tespit edildi. Tasarımı, Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın koloni kurmada kullandığı standart taslaklarla mimari ve fonksiyonel olarak örtüşüyor. Yaşam formu tespit edilmedi. Yapıların durumu, yerleşim yerinin en azından yüz yıl önce terk edildiğine işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: A settlement has been spotted in the vicinity of the derelict ship. Its architectural and functional design is consistent with the Cult of Saint Drusus's standard templates for founding colonies. No lifeforms were detected. The condition of the structures indicates that the settlement has been abandoned for at least a hundred years.
